response.overview: In a basement where every punch is survival, one fighter’s fall shakes the creed to its core. The Trainer’s prized fighter is left in a coma after a brutal match with a mysterious newcomer, sending the basement world into chaos. Unsure how to rebuild, the Trainer faces pressure from his old mentor—who sees the newcomer as the key to reclaiming their dominance. But in this world of blood, loyalty, and survival, every fighter carries a creed… and breaking it comes at a deadly cost.
response.tagline: I'm afraid of what I can do with these hands...
response.title: Basement Creed Vol. I
